Articles.Content:
Hi guys. I had a drive dump and lost my mods. I'm rebuilding most of them but one eludes me.

It sits on the top of the screen and is on the left and right. It displays Apoapsis Height, Periapsis Height Vertical speed etc etc.

Appreciate some help with the name of the mod please ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Regards
VOID is the mod you want I thInk.
Kerbal Engineering Redux also has this feature, with its Heads-Up Displays.
